Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the department of homeless services from requiring a child’s presence in person at an intake facility when a family with children applies for shelter
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the department of homeless services from requiring a child’s presence in person at an intake facility when a family with children applies for shelter

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to report on the feasibility of contracting with community-based organizations to accept and process applications for shelter intake from families with children
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of homeless services to report on the feasibility of contracting with community-based organizations to accept and process applications for shelter intake from families with children.
